name: nepali-date-library
author: Sandip Ghimire

scripts.build:babel: babel dist/index.cjs.js --out-file dist/index.cjs.js --config-file ./babel.config.json && terser dist/index.cjs.js -c -m -o dist/index.cjs.js && babel dist/index.mjs.js --out-file dist/index.mjs.js --config-file ./babel.config.json && terser dist/index.mjs.js -c -m -o dist/index.mjs.js
scripts.build: tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && npm run build:esbuild && npm run build:babel

description: A Nepali Date Library for both typescript and javascript
